entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vernon 7:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023
